subject: feat(workspaces): add multiple workspace support with full isolation
body:
Add complete workspace system allowing users to create, manage, and
switch between independent knowledge graphs. Each workspace has its
own nodes, arcs, and views with no cross-workspace references.

Key changes:
- Workspace type and workspaceId field on all entities (nodes, arcs, views)
- Database v5 migration: workspaces table, workspaceId indexes, existing
  data migrated to Default workspace (ws-default)
- workspaceService: CRUD with events, cascading delete (removes all
  workspace nodes/arcs/views in a single transaction)
- WorkspaceManager: landing page with grid of workspace cards, inline
  create/rename, delete confirmation
- Demo data seeded into separate "Demo" workspace (ws-demo)
- All services and hooks scoped by workspaceId
- Import/export stamps workspaceId on imported data
- Snapshot service scoped to workspace for undo-after-import
- All 316 tests pass, lint clean, build succeeds
